Name: Toko Sumatra Deli
Review Text: The food and cooking here is really exceptional. I've become a regular customer due to the amazing and seemingly authentic use of spices. Also recommend trying the pickles (amazing) and the dessert cakes. All round great place, with warm and friendly people too.

Name: Toko Sumatra Deli
Review Text: Small toko with good quality food. There can be a queue.

Review Text: Delicious and fresh Indonesian food with fast friendly service and good prices.
